nodes.bodyText:
Hi, thx for contributing and sorry for the belayed review, we were focused on 1.0.x release.
Why did we remove the parenthesis? Precedence is not that clear now.
Hi, it's a my IDE option that remove unecessary parenthesis. I can remove it if you want
Hi, yes please, leave it as it was. Intention looks clearer, I reviewed this fairly early in the morning and it took a while to figure out what was happening.
